content: "{\"object\":\"value\",\"document\":{\"object\":\"document\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Similarly to Microsoft 365, G Suite is Google’s collaboration tools. It is \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"NOT replacing\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" EPAM standard collaboration tools and will be used only for purposes of joint business with Google Cloud.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"note-link\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\r\",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"NOTE:\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" \\rDon’t mix up G Suite with partner resources. G Suite is your account in Google.  \\rG Suite account \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"is not\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" automatically providing you access to partner portal or partner trainings.  \\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-3\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\rWhy do I need G Suite?  \\r\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{\"color\":\"#9BC837\"}}}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\rG Suite associated with \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Your_Name@epam.com\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" business address gives you access to Google Mail, Google Docs, Drive, Calendar, Google Video conferencing. \\r\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Your G Suite account is also used to identify you in Google Partner Ecosystem to access partner resources. \\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"note-link\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" \\r\",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"NOTE\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\":  \\rGoogle voice conferencing is required for meetings with Google team. For meetings involving Google representatives make sure to \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"not schedule\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" meetings in Teams.  \\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-3\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\rRequest a G Suite  \\r\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{\"color\":\"#9BC837\"}}}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\rPlease follow the guideline \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://epa.ms/gsuite-gcp\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"epa.ms/gsuite-gcp\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" to get a G Suite account or Google identity for yourself.  \",\"marks\":[]}]}]}}"
